### Advance Contract Award Notice
#### Reference Class Forecast
The Government of Canada intends to award a contract to Oxford Global Projects UK Limited for Project Management services. 

This Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) is issued in accordance with subsection 42.1(1) of the Works, Goods, or Services Procurement Process in the Federal Accountability Act. VIA HFR, as the contracting entity, will partner with Oxford Global Projects UK Limited to develop the largest infrastructure project in Canada in generations. 

The project's scope requires expert support to challenge and enhance the project management and control processes. This includes employing cutting-edge approaches to managing risks, identifying issues, and ensuring decision-making activities are undertaken optimally. 

The required expertise involves:

* Project management
* Economic forecasting

The expected contract start date is July 15, 2024, and the expected end date is December 31, 2028. This notice serves to inform suppliers that VIA HFR intends to award the contract to Oxford Global Projects UK Limited. 

Suppliers who believe they have the capability to satisfy the requirements shall provide a statement of capabilities during the 15-calendar-day posting period. Suppliers must also subject themselves to the contracting entity's procurement process.

**Contract Details:**

* Contract Start Date: 2024-07-15
* Contract End Date: 2024-12-31
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Regions of Opportunity: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland
* Regions of Delivery: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, Canada
* Contact Information: Manuel Melo, [soumissions-tenders@hfr-tgf.ca](mailto:soumissions-tenders@hfr-tgf.ca), (819) 923-7697

Please find additional details in the attached document. [41002/acan---oxford-global-projects-uk-limited-pas240625-002-00_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/41002/acan---oxford-global-projects-uk-limited-pas240625-002-00_0.pdf)
